main event: Multiple elliptical glass-fiber like objects were observed floating and descending in Madisonville, Kentucky for 1 hour 30 minutes.
interesting points: The objects appeared to spin and were carried by a wind of 15 mph., Citizens reported seeing a shower of shiny metallic particles falling from the sky., A Kentucky State Police memorandum noted no sounds or detonations were reported during the sighting., There were prior similar incidents in the area without further investigation deemed necessary., The reporting officer concluded this incident was likely a natural meteorological phenomenon.
sighted object: multiple elliptical, spinning glass-fiber like objects
